Section.title: Overview
Section.Paragraph: The calino package provides a command-line interface for performing tasks such as creating textures, validating textures, and extracting texture data to various file formats. The base calino command is broken into a number of subcommands which are documented over the following sections.
All of the command-line functionality is implemented using the standard calino APIs. Applications wishing to do more advanced image processing should use those APIs directly.
